news_header: PACCAR Inc., Sensata Technologies, and Levi Strauss will trade ex-dividend soon, with specific dividend payouts and expected price changes.
news_original_title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: PACCAR, Sensata Technologies Holding and Levi Strauss
news_text: On February 12, 2025, PACCAR Inc. (PCAR), Sensata Technologies Holding PLC (ST), and Levi Strauss & Co. (LEVI) will trade ex-dividend. PACCAR will pay a quarterly dividend of $0.33 on March 5, 2025, ST will pay $0.12 on February 26, 2025, and LEVI will pay $0.13 on February 28, 2025. Based on recent stock prices, PACCAR's dividend represents approximately 0.31%, ST's 0.46%, and LEVI's 0.70%. Historical dividend stability is important for predicting future yields, which are estimated at 1.25% for PACCAR, 1.86% for ST, and 2.82% for LEVI. Current trading shows PACCAR down 1.5%, ST up 1.5%, and LEVI down 3.2%.
